ISSUE.TITLE: Expo Installation Documentation Link Misdirects to Incorrect GitHub Page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link [Login with Google](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth/social-login/auth-google?platform=react-native#using-native-sign-in-with-google-in-expo) ## Describe the problem I don't think the link to [Expo installation docs](https://github.com/react-native-google-signin/google-signin#expo-installation) is appropriate. When I click the link, it redirects me to the [github](https://github.com/react-native-google-signin/google-signin) repository instead of the actual Expo installation documentation. ## Describe the improvement Shouldn't it correctly direct to https://react-native-google-signin.github.io/docs/setting-up/expo? ## Additional context

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Docs: Improve edge functions debugging guide (#20107) * Docs: Improve edge functions debugging guide * Add: reviewers suggestions
